Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $120. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering it for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and exclusivity of the item. I'm confident it will meet or exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
